name: Linda Loh Adventures in Nurbland Forest Red SQUARE
description:
This work is based on the original HD video Adventures in Nurbland Forest Red, but has been shortened and adapted for NFT display by rendering it in a square format.

It is part of an ongoing series called Adventures in Nurbland which began in 2019.

The works in the series have their origins in light sources, paintings, or landscape elements, which have then been distorted and transformed using various software tools. They were made as an exploration of the elusive form and materiality of digital space, but in subsequent times might present new interpretations.
@__lindaloh__
